name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, develop]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main, develop]

jobs:
  lint:
    name: Lint
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'
          cache-dependency-path: |
            gatekeeper/package-lock.json
            flag-oracle/package-lock.json
      
      - name: Install gatekeeper dependencies
        working-directory: ./gatekeeper
        run: npm ci
      
      - name: Install flag-oracle dependencies
        working-directory: ./flag-oracle
        run: npm ci
      
      - name: Lint gatekeeper
        working-directory: ./gatekeeper
        run: npm run lint
      
      - name: Lint flag-oracle
        working-directory: ./flag-oracle
        run: npm run lint
      
      - name: Check formatting
        working-directory: ./gatekeeper
        run: npx prettier --check "src/**/*.ts"

  test:
    name: Unit Tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'
          cache-dependency-path: |
            gatekeeper/package-lock.json
            flag-oracle/package-lock.json
      
      - name: Install gatekeeper dependencies
        working-directory: ./gatekeeper
        run: npm ci
      
      - name: Install flag-oracle dependencies
        working-directory: ./flag-oracle
        run: npm ci
      
      - name: Test flag-oracle
        working-directory: ./flag-oracle
        run: npm test -- --coverage
      
      - name: Test gatekeeper
        working-directory: ./gatekeeper
        run: npm test -- --coverage
      
      - name: Upload coverage reports
        uses: codecov/codecov-action@v3
        with:
          files: ./flag-oracle/coverage/lcov.info,./gatekeeper/coverage/lcov.info
          flags: unittests
          name: codecov-umbrella

  security:
    name: Security Checks
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
      
      - name: Scan for secrets
        run: |
          chmod +x ./scripts/scan-secrets.sh
          ./scripts/scan-secrets.sh
      
      - name: Audit dependencies (gatekeeper)
        working-directory: ./gatekeeper
        run: npm audit --audit-level=high
        continue-on-error: true
      
      - name: Audit dependencies (flag-oracle)
        working-directory: ./flag-oracle
        run: npm audit --audit-level=high
        continue-on-error: true

  build:
    name: Build and Integration Test
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Create .env file
        run: cp .env.example .env
      
      - name: Build Docker images
        run: docker-compose build
      
      - name: Start services
        run: docker-compose up -d
      
      - name: Wait for services
        run: sleep 30
      
      - name: Check service health
        run: |
          docker-compose ps
          curl -f http://localhost:8080/health || (docker-compose logs && exit 1)
          curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || (docker-compose logs && exit 1)
      
      - name: Run smoke tests
        run: |
          chmod +x ./scripts/smoke-test.sh
          ./scripts/smoke-test.sh
      
      - name: Install Playwright
        run: |
          npm install -D @playwright/test
          npx playwright install --with-deps chromium
      
      - name: Run security header tests
        run: npx playwright test tests/security/headers.spec.ts --reporter=list
      
      - name: Run rate limiting tests
        run: npx playwright test tests/security/rate-limiting.spec.ts --reporter=list
      
      - name: Cleanup
        if: always()
        run: docker-compose down -v
